document_data.name: Chaab
document_data.mainbody: '''Chaab''' was a [[Zhent]] agent during the [[Tyranny of Dragons]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.History: Chaab was an agent of the [[Zhentarim]]. He was sent to [[Phlan]] to investigate the story of a [[black dragon]] that had had strange dealings with outsiders but had recently been killed by adventurers. Chaab however ended up being captured by the [[Foulwater]] [[goblin]] tribe who used the dragon's lair as a base. At last, he was rescued by adventurers hired to defeat the goblins and told them his story.{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|13}} Later Chaab was possibly involved in the case of thief at [[Mantor's Library]], the Zhent's objective was acquire the subterranean complex in [[Dragonspire Mountains]] discovered by the adventurers for themself.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|10}}
